subject: Heisman Trophy
Museums
lead_paragraph: Orphaned from its original home, the Downtown Athletic Club, after 9/11, the 73-year-old Heisman Trophy is putting down roots at the Sports Museum of America.
snippet: Orphaned from its original home, the Downtown Athletic Club, after 9/11, the 73-year-old Heisman Trophy is putting down roots at the Sports Museum of America.
